verses.content: Israel lal Jeroboam kum sâwmhni le kum sari ân lal kum chun Juda lal Amazia naupa Azaria chu ân lal ṭan a.
An lal ṭantir chun ama chu kum sâwm le kum ruk mi a na. Jerusalem- a chun kum sâwmnga le kum hni ân lal a; a nu hming chu Jekolia, Jeru- salem mi a nih.
Chun, a pa Amazia thilthaw ang po thaw vein, LALPA mithmuah thil ṭhatak a thaw hlak a.
Amiruokchu, bâwlhmunhai chu sukbo a ni chuong nawh, bâwlhmun- ahai chun mihai chu an lân thâwiin, riminhnik an la raw zing hlak.
Chun, LALPAIN lal chu a hung hrem tah a, chuongchun, a thi ni chen chun ân phâr a, in tumah a um tah a. Chun, lal naupa Jotham chu an rama mihai rorêlpêkin insûng tieng hotuah a um tah a.
Chuongchun, Azaria chanchin dang a thilthawhai po po chu Juda lalhai inlal lai thu ziekna buah a chuong a ni naw am a nih?
Chun, Azaria chu a pi le puhai lai David khawpuia chun an phûm a; chun, a naupa Jotham chu ama aiawin ân lal tah a.
Juda lal Azaria kum sâwmthum le kum riet ân lal kum chun Jeroboam naupa Zekaria chu Israelhai chung- ah Samari khuoah thla ruk sûng ân lal a.
Chun, a puhai thaw ang bawk, LALPA mithmuah thil ṭha nawtak a thaw hlak a; Israelhai thil insuksuol- tira a thaw Nebat naupa Jeroboam suolnahai kha a mâksan nawh.
Chun, Jabes naupa Sallum chun ama a phier rûk a, mipuihai hmaa chun a thawh a, a that a, a aiawin ân lal tah a.
Chun, Zekaria chanchin dang- hai chu, ngai ta, Israel lalhai inlal lai thu ziekna bua chun a chuong a nih.
Chu chu LALPAIN Jehu kuom- ah, “I naupasalhai chu suon lina chenin Israelhai lalṭhungphaah ṭhung an tih,” ti thu a hril kha a nih. Chuongchun, chuong ang tak chu a hung ni ta hrim a.
Juda lal Uzzia kum sâwmthum le kum kuo ân lal kum chun Jabes naupa Sallum chu ân lal ṭan a; Samari khuoah thla khat sûng ân lal a.
Chun, Gadi naupa Menahem chu Tirza khuoa inthawkin a hang feh a, Samari khuoah a feh a; Jabes naupa Sallum chu Samari khuoa chun a thawh a, a that a, a aiawin ân lal tah a.
Chuongchun, Sallum chanchin danghai, a phier rûkna thuhai chu, ngai ta, Israel lalhai inlal lai thu ziekna buah a chuong a nih.
Chuongchun, Menahem chun Tirzaa inthawk chun Tipsa khuo le a sûnga um po pohai le a ramhai chu a thawh a, an inhawng naw leiin a do a nih; chuonga nau vawnlai nuhmeihai po po chu a phirthlêr a.
Juda lal Azaria kum sâwmthum le kum kuo ân lal kum chun Gadi naupa Menahem chu Israelhai chungah ân lal ṭan a; Samari khuoah kum sâwm ân lal a.
Chun, LALPA mithmuah thil ṭha nawtak a thaw hlak a; Israelhai thil insuksuoltira a thaw Nebat naupa Jeroboam suolnahai kha a dam sûngin a mâksan nawh.
Assuria lal Pula chun an ram chu a hung thawh a; ram chu a nei nghetpui theina dingin Menahem chun Pula chu tangka talent sâng a pêk a.
Chun, Menahem chun Assuria lal pêk dingin Israel mi neinunghai po poa inthawk chun tangka shekel sâwmnga seng a dâwl a. Chuong- chun, Assuria lal chu a kîr nâwk tah a, chu rama chun a um zing nawh a.
Chuongchun, Menahem chan- chin danghai, a thilthaw po pohai chu Israel lalhai inlal lai thu ziekna bua a chuong a ni naw am a nih?
Chun, Menahem chu a pi le puhai kuomah a in veh a; chun, a naupa Pekahia chu ama aiawin ân lal tah a.
Juda lal Azaria kum sâwmnga ân lal kum chun Menahem naupa Pekahia chu Israelhai chungah Samari khuoah ân lal ṭan a, kum hni sûng ân lal a.
LALPA mithmuah thil ṭha nawtak a thaw hlak a; Israelhai thil insuksuoltira a thaw Nebat naupa Jeroboam suolnahai kha a mâksan nawh.

A sipai hotu Remalia naupa Pekain ama chu a phier rûk a, Samari khuoa lal ina kulah Argob leh Arie le chun a that a; a kuoma chun Gilead mi sâwmnga an um veh a; chuong- chun, Pekahia chu a that a, a aiawin ân lal tah a.
Chuongchun, Pekahia chanchin danghai, a thilthaw po pohai chu, ngai ta, Israel lalhai inlal lai thu ziekna bua chun a chuong a nih.
Juda lal Azaria kum sâwmnga le kum hni ân lal kum chun Remalia naupa Peka chu Israelhai chungah Samari khuoa chun ân lal ṭan a; kum sâwmhni ân lal a.
Chun, LALPA mithmuah thil ṭha nawtak a thaw hlak a; Israelhai thil insuksuoltira a thaw Nebat naupa Jeroboam suolnahai kha a mâksan nawh.

Israel lal Peka inlal laiin Assuria lal Tiglath-pileser chun Ijon khuo dâm, Abel-beth-maaka khuo dâm, Janoa khuo dâm, Kedes khuo dâm, Hazor khuo dâm, Gilead le Galili ram dâm, Naphtali ram po po chu a lâk a; chun, Assuria rama chun salah a ṭhuoi a.
Chun, Ela naupa Hosea chun Remalia naupa Peka chu a phier rûk a, a thawh a, a that a. Uzzia naupa Jotham kum sâwmhni ân lal kum chun a aiawin ân lal tah a.
Chuongchun, Peka chanchin danghai, a thilthaw po pohai chu, ngai ta, Israel lalhai inlal lai thu ziekna bua chun a chuong a nih.
Israel lal Remalia naupa Peka kum hni ân lal kum chun Juda lal Uzzia naupa Jotham chu ân lal ṭan a.
Ân lal ṭantir chun kum sâwm- hni le kum nga mi a na; Jerusalemah kum sâwm le kum ruk ân lal a; a nu hming chu Jerusa, Zadok naunu a nih.
Chun, a pa Uzzia thilthaw ang po thaw vein; LALPA mithmuah thil ṭhatak a thaw hlak a.
Amiruokchu, bâwlhmunhai chu sukbo a ni chuong nawh; bâwl- hmunahai chun mihai chu an lân thâwiin, rim inhnik an la raw zing hlak. LALPA in kawtkhâr sakhnung lem chu a siemṭhah a.
Chuongchun, Jotham chanchin danghai, a thilthaw po pohai chu Juda lalhai inlal lai thu ziekna buah a chuong a ni naw am a nih?
Chuong lai chun Suria lal Rezin le, Remalia naupa Peka chu Juda- hai thaw dingin LALPAIN a tir ṭan tah a.
Chun, Jotham chu a pi le puhai kuomah a in tah a, a pi le puhai lai a pu David khawpuia chun an phûm tah a, a naupa Ahaz chu ama aiawin ân lal tah a.
